$:/Search.title: $:/Search
$:/Search.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/Search.text:
{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/close-search}}
<$set name="searchTiddler" value="$:/temp/advancedsearch">
<$edit-text tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" focus={{$:/config/Search/AutoFocus}} focusPopup=<> class="tc-popup-handle"/>
<$button tooltip="show/hide filtered list" aria-label="toggle results" popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" variable="listItem"> <$set name="searchTerm" value={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[!is[system]search:*]"/>"""> {{$:/language/Search/Matches}} {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/advanced-search}} {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/new-tiddler}} {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/options}}
<$reveal tag="div" class="tc-block-dropdown-wrapper tc-simple-search-results" state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal tag="div" class="tc-block-dropdown tc-search-drop-down tc-popup-handle" state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default=""> <$list filter="[minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" emptyMessage="""
{{$:/language/Search/Search/TooShort}}
""" variable="listItem"> {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/results}}
<$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/settings/edit" text="yes"> <$button message="tm-edit-tiddler" param={{!!title}} tooltip="edit tiddler" aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Edit/Caption}} class=<>> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> edit

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/abo.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/about
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/abo.text:
A nice and simple overlay interface for searching your wiki. Designed for mobile and desktop screens. 
''Reduce to the max.'' The standard search input field in the sidebar is removed, instead there is a {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/search}} [[button|$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/search]].

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/for.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/fork
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/for.creator: LinOnetwo
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/for.text:
To make modification to make it looks like the search bar in the Notion.so, I fork Thomas Elmiger's plugin, and made this modification.

I really appreciate the original work, thank you, Thomas Elmiger!

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ima.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/images/search-button

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ima.text:
<svg class="tc-image-advanced-search-button tc-image-button" width="22pt" height="22pt" viewBox="0 0 128 128">

</svg>

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/mac.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/macros
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/mac.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/mac.text:
\define tempStory() $:/temp/simple-search/story

\define simple-search-openSearch()
<$action-navigate $to="$:/Search" $scroll="no"/>
<$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title[$:/AdvancedSearch]]">
<<simple-search-closeAdvanced>>
</$list>
\end

\define simple-search-closeSearch()
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param="$:/Search"/>
<<simple-search-restoreAdvanced>>
\end

\define simple-search-closeAdvanced()
<$set name="myStory" filter="[list[$:/StoryList]]" >
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tempStory>> $field="text" $value=<<myStory>>/>
</$set>
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param="$:/AdvancedSearch"/>
\end

\define simple-search-restoreAdvanced()
<$list filter="[<tempStory>!is[missing]]">
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/StoryList" list={{{ [<tempStory>get[text]] }}}/>
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<tempStory>>/>
</$list>
\end

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/rea.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/readme
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/rea.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/rea.text:
!! Simple Search 

{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/about}}

!!! Keyboard accessible

* Press <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>P</kbd> to ''launch'' or ''close'' Simple Search (same as Notion, or define your own shortcut [[in the control panel|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts]]). 
* Navigate with <kbd>Tab</kbd>
** {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/advanced-search}} takes you to $:/AdvancedSearch
** the next <kbd>Tab</kbd> jumps to the search results.

Depending on your browser and settings, you can select a list item using <kbd>Tab</kbd> or <kbd>up</kbd> and <kbd>down</kbd> arrow keys, finally confirm your choice with <kbd>Enter</kbd>.


!!! Search in fields
Primary results are listed for tiddlers containing the search term in the ''title'' OR the ''caption'' fields. 

The secondary list finds results based on all other fields (not title nor caption). This can be adapted via settings.


!!! Create tiddlers

Empty result list? No problem. Create missing tiddlers using the search term as title and caption. 

* Hit <kbd>Tab</kbd> until you reach the plus button (+).
* Create a tiddler with <kbd>Enter</kbd>.

See template options on the ''settings tab''. – Hat tip to //Diego Mesa// for inspiring this feature.


!!! Settings

Make sure to visit the ''settings tab'' to adjust your preferences.


!! Core overruling

This plugin overwrites $:/core/ui/SideBarSegments/search and nothing else.

!! Fork

{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/fork}}

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/set.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/settings
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/set.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/set.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/Basics/ !! Settings An options button is available on the search layer so you can always return to these settings when necessary. <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/hide-options-button.css" invertTag="yes" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> show the {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/options}} button !!! Design ''Layer animation:'' Simple Search feels rather slow for values above 150, so make sure to check this TW setting.
<$link to="$:/config/AnimationDuration"><> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/AnimationDuration" default="" tag="input"/> ''Search box border:'' Adapt the colour to the design of your wiki. Use //transparent// if you don’t want a border.
[[Border colour:|$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/settings/border-colour]] <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/settings/border-colour" tag="input"/> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/settings/border-colour" type="color" tag="input"/> !!! Search button <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/search" field="text" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show"> show in Page Toolbar (in the sidebar) <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/search" tag="$:/tags/TopRightBar"> show in Top Right Bar (besides the sidebar toggle, permanently visible) !!! Minimal search term length !!! Fields to search This list defines, which fields are relevant for the secondary result list (“Other”). The default value `-caption,title` leads to searches in all fields except caption and title. See [[search operator documentation|https://tiddlywiki.com/#search%20Operator]] for more info. !!! Create new tiddlers <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/hide-new-button.css" invertTag="yes" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> show the {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/new-tiddler}} button Define the template for new tiddlers you can create based on search terms. The default value `{{$:/temp/advancedsearch}}` inserts your search term as title and caption. Use the following field to add tags to tiddlers created via Simple Search. Don’t forget to add brackets to tags containing spaces, e.g. `[[My Tag]] Foo Bar`. --- !!! Search layer edit mode Would you like to edit the tiddler $:/Search? Activate edit mode here: <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/settings/edit" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no"> Show edit icon in lower left corner of the screen.

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/sea.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/search.css
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/sea.creator: Thomas Elmiger

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/sup.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/support
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/sup.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/sup.text:
!! Support the Author ''Hi!'' I’m Thomas, the author of [[tid.li/tw5/plugins.html|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html]]. Feedback is always welcome, as well as funding for maintenance, support and new projects :) --- !!! One Time Support If using my plugins just makes you happy, consider a one time payment via ~PayPal to reward the effort: https://www.paypal.me/telmiger --- !!! Permanent Support If my tools make you more productive or save you time in your job or your everyday life, you can support me as a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/telmiger --- !!! Thank You Substantial parts of my availabe time go to the deveopment of useful plugins for [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com/]]. – Many others do the same and I would like to thank them all, especially [[Jeremy Ruston|https://tiddlywiki.com/#JeremyRuston]] and all the active members of the community! //Hereby I promise to share future revenues (if any) with other developers who’s works I use or who inspired me.// If you like my work, I would be very happy to hear from you. ''Thank you very much for your support!''
//Thomas// https://thomas-elmiger.ch

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/clear-search
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.caption: Clear Search
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.text:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="clear search field" aria-label="reset search">
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text="" />
{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
</$button>

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/new-tiddler
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.caption: Create tiddler named with search term

$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/search
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.caption: {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/images/search-button}} Search
$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/.text: \define search-button-label() <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/images/search-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/search!!description}}/> \end \define control-panel-button-on(class) <$button tooltip={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/search!!description}} aria-label={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/search!!description}} class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $class$"""> <> <> \end \define control-panel-button-off(class) <$button tooltip="Close Search" aria-label="Hide tiddler Search" class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $class$"""> <> <> \end <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title[$:/Search]]" emptyMessage=<>> <>
